messages.message:
Hi team,

I'm trying to run some backend unit tests locally... specifically this suite `test_aihub_tasks.py`

However when I run the tests like -> `make test TEST_NAMES=instabase.tasks.apps.test_aihub_tasks`

I'm seeing

```ImportError: MagickWand shared library not found.
You probably had not installed ImageMagick library.
Try to install:
  https://docs.wand-py.org/en/latest/guide/install.html```
and when I run `pip install Wand` it says the requirement is already satisfied.

Has anyone seen this issue before or something similar?

You need to install the c ibrary.
```sudo apt-get install libmagickwand-dev```
